data.title: French Meeting in Pitzunda.. (1974)
data.meta_description: The meeting between Leonid Brezhnev and George Pompidu in Pitsunda.
data.text:
At Vnukovo airport pass LI Brezhnev, AA Gromyko, serving to Pitsunda to meet with French President Georges Pompidou, and escort them members of the Soviet government.

Flags of the USSR and France on the flagpole.

LI Brezhnev talks with the mourners; together with AA Gromyko climbs the ladder into the plane.

The plane was taxiing for takeoff.

Flags of the Soviet Union and France at the airport in Adler.

LI Brezhnev down the ramp.

At the airport in Adler LI Brezhnev met: MA Suslov and leaders of Party, government and public organizations of the Georgian SSR, the Krasnodar Territory and the Abkhazian SSR.

Motorcade passes through the streets of Adler, heading Pitsundu.

Our people in the streets waving flags Adler and flowers.

Seacoast Adler.

Picunda.

Pine Grove.

Quay Pitsunda.

Holidaymakers on the streets and squares of Pitsunda.

Outdoor pool on the beach.

March 12, 1974 Airfield "Sochi" in Adler.

The helicopter landed at the airport in Adler, from a helicopter go LI Brezhnev, AA Gromyko and other officials who came to meet Georges Pompidou.

LI Brezhnev at the airport answering journalists' questions.

Children with flowers at the airport.

By plane down French President Georges Pompidou, French Foreign Minister Michel Jobert, Secretary General of the Office of the President Edouard Balladur Republic, Secretary General of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs Geoffrey de Courcelles and other officials.

Children presented flowers Georges Pompidou; LI Brezhnev and Georges Pompidou are on the airfield to the airport.

LI Brezhnev and Georges Pompidou enter the hall of negotiations.

LI Brezhnev, AA Gromyko, the Soviet Ambassador in France SV Chervonenko, Assistant General Secretary of the CPSU AM Aleksandrov and AI Blatov, member of the board of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs Y. Dubinin - the Soviet side; Georges Pompidou, M. Jobert E. Balladur, J. de Courcelles, French Ambassador to the USSR Jean Vimont, Calvados - the French side take part in the conversation.

Press conference for Soviet and foreign journalists at the press center.

Director General of TASS LM Zamyatin read out a press statement.

Listening journalists.

At the press conference is representative of the French press Marchetti.

Journalists have phones and typewriters in the press center after the press conference.

Meeting of Ministers of Foreign Affairs of the USSR and France - AA Gromyko and M. Jobert at the negotiating table.

By residence LI Brezhnev approaching cars.

LI Brezhnev and AA Gromyko met Georges Pompidou.

The second meeting of LI Brezhnev and Georges Pompidou.

On the terrace of the residence LI Brezhnev Georges Pompidou speaks to reporters.

Listening journalists.

LI Brezhnev and Georges Pompidou and their accompanying persons at the airport in Adler.

French guests say goodbye to the Soviet leaders; climb the ladder on the plane; the aircraft was taxiing to the start.
